    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"

>
[Shaitan Skin](/Feats.aspx?ID=2576) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Oread" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=304" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 107 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

When in danger, you can harden the stone in your skin into armor, much like a [shaitan](/Monsters.aspx?ID=213). You can cast [_stoneskin_](/Spells.aspx?ID=312) on yourself only, 3 times per day as a 4th-level arcane innate spell.
name: Shaitan Skin
